```{r}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
theme_set(theme_bw())
library(tidymodels)
library(arrow)
})
```

Import Data:

```{r}
Tor_hitting <- read_csv("TOR_batting.csv")
```

Cleaning:

```{r}
Tor_hitting_clean <- 
  select(Tor_hitting, -Rank)

Tor_hitting_clean
```

Split into training, validation and testing data:

```{r}
hitting_split <- 
  initial_validation_split(Tor_hitting, prop = c(0.6, 0.2))
  training <- training(hitting_split)
  validation <- validation(hitting_split)
  test <- testing(hitting_split)
hitting_split
```
